    • Method Detail

      • encode

        public int encode(byte[] rawAudio,
         int offset,
         int length,
         byte[] encodedAudio,
         short frameLengthMs,
         int noiseSupressionMode)
        Encodes PCM 16-bit, 8000hz audio at 20/30ms iLBC mode.
        Parameters:
        byte[] - rawAudio - PCM 16bit 8000hz Audio, ideally in chunks divisible by 320 bytes(160 16 bit samples). Other size will result in audio degredation.
        int - offset - Offset in rawAudio
        int - length - Length of bytes to read from rawAudio
        byte[] - encodedAudio - iLBC encoded audio
        frameLengthMs - 20 or 30 depending on the mode.
        int - nsMode - Noise Supression Level - 0:Off, 1: Mild, 2: Medium , 3: Aggressive
        Returns:
        int - bytes encoded length.

      • resetEncoder

        public int resetEncoder()
        Frees and resets the encoder instance After encoding an audio clip this should be called.

      • decode

        public int decode(byte[] encodedAudio,
         int offset,
         int length,
         short frameLengthMs,
         byte[] rawAudio)
        Decodes iLBC 20/30ms mode audio to PCM 16 bit 8000hz audio.
        Parameters:
        byte[] - encodedAudio - iLBC 20/30ms encoded audio.
        int - offset - Offset in encodedAudio
        int - length - Length of bytes to read from encodedAudio.
        frameLengthMs - 20 or 30 depending on the mode.
        byte[] - rawAudio - iLBC encoded audio
        Returns:
        int - bytes decoded length.

      • resetDecoder

        public int resetDecoder()
        Frees and resets the decoder instance After decoding an audio clip this should be called.

      • instance

        public static Codec instance()
